name: shapelessness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being shapeless (= without a clear form or structure): There was no horizon; the cliffs a few miles off had faded into a hazy shapelessness. The essay suffers from a kind of shapelessness. See
shapeless
More examplesFewer examplesSea monsters embody the shapelessness of the seas. The caves were inhabited only by creatures of darkness and shapelessness.Often her characters express a sense of life's shapelessness.
